content: **measurements ** 19cm 7 5in high x 11cm 4 3in wide **list of materials ** scheepjes catona 100% mercerised cotton 50g/125m - yarn a 249 saffron x 1 ball - yarn b 393 charcoal x 1 ball scheepjes catona 100% mercerised cotton 25g/62 5m - yarn c 130 old lace x 1 ball - yarn d 106 snow white x 1 ball 2 50mm crochet hook wobble ball 110mm 2x 8mm safety eyes stitch markers scrap black laceweight yarn or sewing thread scrap pink cotton yarn polyester stuffing wobbly beetrice is part of pretty little things issue 03 - garden which is available in print via scheepjes retailers and as a digital download ebook
